00012 string dissectCodeSingle(MavenCompiler* c, string bareword, string entity, string element,
00013                                                  string args, string signature, string& type, MavenMutability& mut,
00014                                                  string nextop) {
00015         
00016         // bareword is for things such as variable names and like: 3, new, "A String" etc
00017         // entity is for things like functions, classes, objects etc
00018         
00019         // or not
00020         MavenFunction f;
00021         string resolve = ""; //resolveFunction(c, entity, f, signature, namespaceID, objectID, args);
00022         
00023         // calling a Selector
00024         if(f.returnType.substr(0, 5) == "<call") {
00025                 type = f.returnType.substr(6, f.returnType.length() - 7);
00026                 StringList splitArgs = splitCommas(args);
00027                 string r = "*((" + type + "*) " + resolve + "->call(";
00028                 for(int i = 0; i < splitArgs.length(); ++i) {
00029                         if(i > 0) r += ",";
00030                         r += "maven::Selector::voidise(" + splitArgs[i] + ")";
00031                 }
00032                 r += "))";
00033                 return r;
00034         }
00035         
00036         type = MAVEN_INVALID;
00037         return MAVEN_INVALID;
00038 }
